channel.title: Advanced on Jenkins Pipeline Workshop Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced on Jenkins Pipeline Workshop Resources

item.title: Build Name
item.description: Build Name node { //this will replace the build number in the Jenkins UI. currentBuild.displayName = "Cerner - " + currentBuild.number //this will show up as a grey text block below the build number currentBuild.description = "Kansas City" }

item.title: Remote Loader
item.description: Pipeline Remote Loader node { def remoteScript = fileLoader.fromGit('jenkins/release.groovy', "https://github.com/nrayapati/devopsdays_test.git", 'master', null, '') remoteScript.prepare() remoteScript.release() remoteScript.clean() }

item.title: Lockable Resources
item.description: Lockable REsources lock(quantity: 1, resource: 'devops1') { sleep time: 1, unit: 'MINUTES' }

item.title: Config File Provider
item.description: Config File Provider node { configFileProvider([configFile(fileId: 'sample_json', variable: 'testJsonFileName')]) { println testJsonFileName.toString() def testJsonfile = readFile "${testJsonFileName.toString()}" println testJsonfile } }

item.title: Script Approval vs Sandbox
item.description: Script Approval vs Sandbox Code at https://github.com/nrayapati/devopsdays_library/blob/master/vars/retryWithPrompt.groovy#L17 @Library("devopsdays") _ retryWithPrompt { error "Anticipated error..." }

item.title: SSH Agent
item.description: SSH Agent node { step([$class: 'WsCleanup']) sshagent(['devopsdays_ssh']) { git branch: 'test', url: 'https://github.com/nrayapati/devopsdays_test.git' sh "ssh-keyscan -H github.com >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts" sh "git remote set-url origin git@github.com:nrayapati/devopsdays_test.git" sh "git config user.email naresh.rayapati@gmail.com" sh "git config user.name nrayapati" sh 'git checkout -b devopsdays' sh 'git push origin devopsdays' } }

item.title: Job DSL
item.description: Job DSL folder("DevOpsDays/3_Best_Practices/test_folder") { } pipelineJob('DevOpsDays/3_Best_Practices/test_folder/simple_pipeline') { displayName('simple_pipeline') description('simple_pipeline') definition { cpsScm { scm { git { remote { url('https://github.com/nrayapati/devopsdays_test.git') branch('master') } } } } } triggers { githubPush() } properties { buildDiscarder { strategy { logRotator { artifactDaysToKeepStr('2') artifactNumToKeepStr('2') daysToKeepStr('2') numToKeepStr('2') } } } } }

item.title: Flow Control
item.description: Flow Control @Library("devopsdays") _ input message: 'INPUT EXAMPLE', ok: 'DevOpsDays', parameters: [string(defaultValue: '', description: '', name: 'STRING_PARAM', trim: false), booleanParam(defaultValue: false, description: '', name: 'BOOLEAN_PARAM')] retryWithPrompt { error "error during the demo" }
